<![CDATA[CBC | Sports News ]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/?cmp=rss en-ca Sun, 18 Feb 2018 10:42:13 EST CBC.ca http://www.cbc.ca/rss/image/cbc_144.gif http://www.cbc.ca/news/?cmp=rss <![CDATA[Kevin Poulin backstops Canada's hockey men to Olympic quarter-finals]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/ice-hockey/canada-south-korea-hockey-olympics-1.4541148?cmp=rss 1.4541148 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:36:08 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Ice Hockey

Former New York Islanders goalie Kevin Poulin led Canada to a quarter-final berth at the Olympics with a 19-save shutout in Sunday's 4-0 victory over host South Korea in its final game of the preliminary round.

]]> <![CDATA[Russian athlete in Pyeongchang suspected of doping violation]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/russia-doping-positive-pyeongchang-1.4541100?cmp=rss 1.4541100 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 07:51:42 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018

The Russian delegation at the Olympics in Pyeongchang has confirmed that it has received official notification from the International Olympic Committee of a possible doping violation by one of its athletes.

]]> <![CDATA[Olympic wake-up call: Day 9 news you might have missed from the Winter Games]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/olympic-wake-up-february-18-1.4541009?cmp=rss 1.4541009 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 04:15:47 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018

Here's a quick recap of all the important Olympic news you might have missed overnight, and a look at what's still to come later today.

]]> <![CDATA[Mike Babcock phone call boosts resurgent Homan team]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/curling/mike-babcock-rachel-homan-comeback-1.4541120?cmp=rss 1.4541120 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:17:14 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Curling

A call from Toronto Maple Leafs head coach Mike Babcock gave Rachel Homan's team some extra motivation before earning its second straight victory following an 0-3 start at the Olympics.

]]> <![CDATA[Golden 'Grams: Alex Beaulieu-Marchand is the ultimate wingman]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/golden-grams-abm-1.4541062?cmp=rss 1.4541062 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 07:33:05 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018

The bronze medallist said "Hi" to his mom and then tried to get his sister a boyfriend, on national television.

]]> <![CDATA[Alex Beaulieu-Marchand soars to ski slopestyle bronze]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/freestyle-skiing/mens-ski-slopestyle-pyeongchang-olympics-feb-18-1.4541010?cmp=rss 1.4541010 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 00:46:24 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Freestyle Skiing

Canadian Alex Beaulieu-Marchand soared to bronze with a best-run score of 92.40 in the men's ski slopestyle final on Sunday in Pyeongchang, South Korea.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada's Kripps, Kopacz in podium position at midway point of 2-man bobsleigh]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/bobsleigh/canada-bobsleigh-2-man-1.4541092?cmp=rss 1.4541092 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:09:45 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Bobsleigh

The Canadian pair sits in second after posting a combined two-run time of one minute, 38.49 seconds on Sunday. They trail the German team of Nico Walther and Christian Poser, who are first in 1:38.39.

]]> <![CDATA[Blackhawks fans ejected after racist taunts toward Capitals' Devante Smith-Pelly ]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/hockey/nhl/blackhawks-chicago-racism-devante-smith-pelly-1.4541211?cmp=rss 1.4541211 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 10:42:13 EST The Associated Press Sports/Hockey/NHL

A visiting black player was taunted by four male fans shouting "basketball, basketball, basketball" Saturday night during the Chicago Blackhawks' game against the Washington Capitals.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada's curling men not panicking after setbacks]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/curling/canadian-curling-men-not-panicking-after-setbacks-1.4541018?cmp=rss 1.4541018 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 23:45:14 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Curling

Back-to-back losses have Canadian fans uneasy, yet Kevin Koe and his rink aren't worried. In fact, the Canadian men's curling team believes its in a good position.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada's Homan continues climb with narrow win over Switzerland]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/curling/womens-curling-rachel-homan-canada-switzerland-round-robin-1.4541030?cmp=rss 1.4541030 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 02:57:56 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Curling

Rachel Homan and her Canadian rink used a triple in the ninth end to complete a10-8 comeback win against Switzerland in Pyeongchang, South Korea on Sunday.

]]> <![CDATA[Czechs win group, put pressure on Canada to reach quarters]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/ice-hockey/czech-switzerland-mens-hockey-pyeongchang-olympics-1.4541031?cmp=rss 1.4541031 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 05:09:39 EST The Associated Press Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Ice Hockey

The Czech Republic denied Canada a chance at winning Group A by defeating Switzerland 4-1 at the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea.

]]> <![CDATA[Feel the rhythm and become a bobsleigh instant expert]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/bobsleigh/bobsleigh-instant-expert-2018-winter-olympics-1.4510032?cmp=rss 1.4510032 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 12:24:52 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Bobsleigh

Bobsleigh has evolved from a way to entertain wealthy tourists in Switzerland to an intense Olympic event that simultaneously demands brute strength, split-second timing and acute attention to detail. Here's everything you need to know to instantly become a bobsleigh expert.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada's Dara Howell driven to return to the top]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/freestyle-skiing/dara-howell-womens-ski-slopestyle-pyeongchang-olympics-1.4540844?cmp=rss 1.4540844 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 02:26:12 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Freestyle Skiing

Canada's Dara Howell won gold in the inaugural women's slopestyle ski competition in Sochi. But the sudden fame was a lot for the then 19-year-old to handle.

]]> <![CDATA[Norway wins cross-country relay gold, Canada 9th without Alex Harvey]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/cross-country-mens-relay-pyeongchang-2018-olympics-1.4541076?cmp=rss 1.4541076 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 05:12:42 EST Reuters Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018

Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo secured a majestic victory in the men’s 4x10 km relay with a stunning late spurt as Norway won its fifth gold medal in eight cross-country skiing competitions at the Pyeongchang Games on Sunday.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada on record Olympic medal pace in Pyeongchang]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/canada-olympic-winter-medal-record-pace-1.4538172?cmp=rss 1.4538172 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:11:47 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018

At Saturday's midway point of the Winter Games, Canada is on track to break its record medal haul of 26, set in Vancouver 2010.

]]> <![CDATA[Rene Bourque's Olympic swan song worth all the hockey scars]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/ice-hockey/rene-bourque-olympic-hurrah-canada-1.4540810?cmp=rss 1.4540810 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 17:23:57 EST for CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Ice Hockey

Rene Bourque, 36, hopes to cap his professional hockey playing career with Olympic gold. The former NHL journeyman has three goals in two games heading into Team Canada's final preliminary-round match.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada's women's hockey team firing on all cylinders heading into semifinal]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/ice-hockey/canada-oar-womens-hockey-semifinal-pyeongchang-olympics-1.4540809?cmp=rss 1.4540809 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 17:01:31 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Ice Hockey

If the Olympic Athletes from Russia are to have any chance of upsetting the Canadian women's hockey team, they'll have to find some way of slowing the Canucks' red-hot offence.

]]> <![CDATA[Eric Hosmer joins Padres on 8-year, $144M deal: reports]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/baseball/mlb/eric-hosmer-san-diego-padres-1.4541155?cmp=rss 1.4541155 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:33:58 EST The Associated Press Sports/Baseball/MLB

Free-agent first baseman Eric Hosmer has agreed to an eight-year, $144 million US deal with the San Diego Padres, according to published reports Saturday night.

]]> <![CDATA[Watch the Toronto Wolfpack vs. Halifax RLFC]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/rugby/toronto-wolfpack-live-stream-1.4539110?cmp=rss 1.4539110 Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:07:54 EST CBC Sports Sports/Rugby

Watch as the Toronto Wolfpack look to continue their strong start in the English rugby league’s second tier as they take on Halifax RLFC on Sunday.

]]> <![CDATA[Canada pays for early mistake to lose second straight in men's curling]]> http://www.cbc.ca/sports/olympics/pyeongchang/curling/canada-switzerland-draw-6-olympic-curling-1.4540924?cmp=rss 1.4540924 Sat, 17 Feb 2018 22:22:53 EST CBC Sports Sports/Olympics/Pyeongchang 2018/Curling

Team Canada suffered its second straight defeat with a 10-8 loss to Switzerland on Sunday in Pyeongchang.
